slogan: Learn, teach, challenge yourself, and connect with the world around you in a modern way!
dashboard_description: Our modern dictionary serves as a comprehensive and user-friendly tool, allowing you to quickly and easily access definitions, synonyms, and accurate translations of words.
title_chart: Data Chart for the Last 30 Days
name: Name
created_by: Created and configured by Kasra Mehralizadeh and Mojtaba Allam
confirm_password_message: For your security, please confirm your password to continue.
api_token_description: API tokens allow third-party services to authenticate with our application on your behalf.
delete_toPasswordken_info: You can delete any of your existing tokens if they are no longer needed.
copy_api_token: Please copy your new API token. For security reasons, it will not be shown again.
confirm_delete_api_token: Are you sure you want to delete this API token?
forgot_password_message: No problem. Just let us know your email address, and we will send you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new password.
create_team_des: Create a new team to collaborate with others on projects.
delete_team_warning: Once a team is deleted, all its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please download any data you want to keep before deleting this team.
delete_team_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this team? Once a team is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.
add_team_member_desc: Adding a new member to your team allows them to collaborate with you.
enter_email: Please enter the email address of the person you want to add to this team.
pending_invitations: These people have been invited to your team, and an invitation email has been sent. They can join by accepting the invitation.
team_members_desc: All the people who are members of this team.
leave_team_confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave this team?
delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all its resources and data will be permanently erased. Please enter your password to confirm the permanent deletion of your account.
delete_account_warning: Once your account is deleted, all its resources and data will be permanently removed. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information you want to keep.
manage_and_logout_sessions: Manage and log out of your active sessions in browsers and other devices.
logout_other_sessions_info: If necessary, you can log out of all other browser sessions on all devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be complete. If you believe your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
logout_other_sessions: Log Out of Other Browser Sessions
confirm_logout_other_sessions: Please enter your password to confirm logging out of other browser sessions on all your devices.
two_factor_auth_description: Enhance your account security with two-factor authentication.
two_factor_disabled: You have not enabled two-factor authentication.
two_factor_info: When two-factor authentication is enabled, you will be required to enter a secure, random token during login. You can get this token from your Google Authenticator mobile app.
two_factor_setup_instructions: To complete the setup, scan the QR code below using your mobile authentication app or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP.
two_factor_now_active: Two-factor authentication is now active. Scan the QR code below using your mobile authentication app or enter the setup key.
store_recovery_codes: Store these recovery codes securely in a password manager. If you lose access to your two-factor authentication device, these codes can help you regain account access.
password_security_notice: For security, ensure that your account uses a long and random password.
update_profile_info: Update your profile information and email address.
email_not_verified: Your email address is not verified.
resend_verification_email: Click here to resend the verification email.
verification_email_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
auth_confirm: Please confirm access to your account by entering the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
auth_recovery: Please confirm access to your account by entering one of your emergency recovery codes.
verify_email: Before continuing, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
email_verification_sent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided in your profile settings.
whether_it_is_for_work_or_daily_conversa: whether it is for work or daily conversations
trusted_in_more_than_100_countries: Trusted in more than 100 countries & 5 million customers.
